item.description: Download Link Elie Hymowitz (438) 825 - 9185 ehymowitz@gmail.com Work Experience Haply Robotics, Montreal, QC Jan 2018 –Present Business Development Coordinator Project management and outward business growth lead Product demo and user feedback capture Web development and marketing media generation MDA Corporation, St. Anne de Bellevue, QC May 2017 – December 2018 Component Engineer Responsible for reliability of satellite components on multiple projects

Places People Places Belize Old Port Somewhere Art Osheaga St. Viateur Store Place Des Art

Transcriptions A few videos of my playing through these can be found on my instagram. Contact me if you have any questions! (All transcriptions made with MuseScore) Solos Autumn Leaves - Chet Baker Solo There Will Never Be Another You - Chet Baker Solo Blue Bossa - Dexter Gordon Solo All The Things You Are in C# - Charles Mingus Quintet Partial Transcriptions Lingus - Snarky Puppy (Michael League Part) Spain - Chick Corea & Return to Forever (Stanley Clarke Part) Funk The Fear - Esperanza Spalding (Verse and Chorus Bass) Other We Don't Care - Kanye West Lost Woods (Ocarina of Time) - Koji Kondo Mii Channel Theme - Kazumi Totaka

item.title: Things
item.description: As mentioned in the caption of this website I make music and things! Most of the details of how I'm building what I'm working on can be found on my GitHub page, but here are some of the projects I work on that are cool to see. Plug for the tool I use for some of these, the Haplet Graphics I like using Java to make cool visualizations!
